QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Razorfen Downs
QuestData.Description: The Warchief has requested that any able-bodied adventurer head to Razorfen Downs, in Thousand Needles, immediately!$B$BThe mysterious Koristrasza needs help to stop the Scourge-Quilboar alliance! If you so choose, head to Razorfen Downs and speak with Koristrasza to lend her your skills.
